text:
Dear component owner,

I'm missing the handy option waitfor="false"/fork="true" for the ant core task 
exec. It is possible to fork java processes but not so for executables. I would 
like to have an option for exec to be able to fork the process to execute the 
given executable. Unfortunately, I couldn't find anything about it.
Regards,
Falcony
creator: falcony@gmx.net

text:
<java fork> doesn't do what you expect, it spawns a new VM instead of running
the class in Ant's VM.  <java> will wait for the process to finish in either
case.

CVS HEAD adds a new spawn attribute to <exec> and <java>, this is what you are
looking for.
creator: bodewig@apache.org
